channel.title: VenomousX 638
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img191/7939/gbpu.png[/img] BEFORE YOU ALL BEGIN TO HATE ON THIS THREAD, THIS IS HALF AND ADVERTISEMENT THREAD & HALF PROJECT THREAD, REASON BEING IS, AS I AM RUNNING THE UPDATES I LOVE SEEING THE COMMUNITY ENJOYING THEM <3
VenomousX 639, Owner & Coder is me Format. I am coding this server using the Dementhium 639 base. So far it looks leeched, but I will be running alot of heavy updates and adding unique content (hopefully other servers don't have).
I am allowing players to have access to the server, as I feel it will make a better community, if they are able to experience the updates themselves (beta). Basically the server is open, but it is not official. (On VPS) You can play the server here [url=http://www.venomousx.com/forum/]VenomousX[/url] Or Download it: [URL=http://"http://venomousx.com/forum/index.php?/forum/20-desktop-client/"]Link[/URL] [SPOILER=Some Media][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img856/4156/y5mu.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img51/2315/ue4v.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img21/8812/am7v.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img837/4003/f09w.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img40/1039/nbu4.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img42/9177/if34.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img713/8959/jv07.png[/img] [/SPOILER] [/CENTER] [img]http://services.runescape.com/m=rswikiimages/en/2012/11/gathering-19103809.png[/img][COLOR="#0000FF"]Content:[/COLOR] [COLOR="#FF0000"]Automatic Donating[/COLOR] [COLOR="#00FF00"]Automatic Voting[/COLOR] [COLOR="#FFFF00"]Pk Titles Kill streaks[/COLOR] [COLOR="#FF0000"]Control Panel[/COLOR] [COLOR="#00FF00"]Players online Interface[/COLOR] [COLOR="#FFFF00"]Yells[/COLOR] [COLOR="#FFFF00"]Rank System[/COLOR] [COLOR="#FF0000"]Ranking System[/COLOR] [COLOR="#FF0000"]Coloured Skin[/COLOR] [COLOR="#FFFF00"]Custom images (client background etc)[/COLOR] [COLOR="#FF0000"]Xp Boosts for Donator+ Donator xp bar (similar to the current xp bar) Donator xp shop Player Xp bar (similar to the current xp bar) Player Xp shop Loyalty system Loyalty Shop Working Auras Custom Donator items[/COLOR] [COLOR="#FFFF00"]Vote Store PvP Store Unique Donator zone[/COLOR] [COLOR="#FF0000"]Grand Exchange (Will do eventually) Custom kill streak weapons + Drop Weapons Tokhaar-kal Steadfast boots Glaiven Boots Ragefire Boots PvP World (World 2) PvM Titles + Rewards [/COLOR] [COLOR="#0000FF"]Clue Scrolls:[/COLOR] [COLOR="#FF0000"]Easy Medium Hard Elite[/COLOR]
[img]http://services.runescape.com/m=rswikiimages/en/2012/11/support-19105759.png[/img][COLOR="#0000FF"]Quests:[/COLOR] [COLOR="#FF0000"]Black Knights Fortress Desert treasure Lost city Monkey Madness Wanted Shield of Arrav The Knights Sword Rune Mysteries The Restless Ghost Vampire Slayer Ernest the Chicken The Freminnik Trials Big Chompy Bird hunting (Custom) The Dig site Elemental Workshop I Priest in Peril Horror from the Deep Goblin Diplomacy[/COLOR]
[img]http://services.runescape.com/m=rswikiimages/en/2012/11/artisan-19102716.png[/img][COLOR="#0000FF"]Skills:[/COLOR] [COLOR="#FFFF00"]Summoning[/COLOR] [COLOR="#FF0000"]Dungeoneering[/COLOR] [COLOR="#FF0000"]Farming[/COLOR] [COLOR="#FFFF00"]Cooking Fishing Crafting Slayer[/COLOR] [COLOR="#FF0000"]Construction[/COLOR] [COLOR="#FFFF00"]Thieving Herblore Hunter[/COLOR]
[img]http://services.runescape.com/m=rswikiimages/en/2012/11/combat-19103157.png[/img][COLOR="#0000FF"]Combat:[/COLOR] [COLOR="#FFFF00"]Dharok's Great-Axe[/COLOR] [COLOR="#FFFF00"]Granite Maul[/COLOR] [COLOR="#FFFF00"]Korasi's Sword Primal weapons Primal armour[/COLOR]

More updates will be added on a regular bases, if you wish to support us, show to everyone by using our signature: [CENTER][SPOILER=I Support VenomousX]Signature coming soon[/SPOILER] [/CENTER]

item.title: VenomousX 638
item.dc:creator: @ggson ggson
item.description:
@ggson wrote:

[CENTER]
BEFORE YOU ALL BEGIN TO HATE ON THIS THREAD, THIS IS HALF AND ADVERTISEMENT THREAD & HALF PROJECT THREAD, REASON BEING IS, AS I AM RUNNING THE UPDATES I LOVE SEEING THE COMMUNITY ENJOYING THEM <3

VenomousX 639, Owner & Coder is me Format. I am coding this server using the Dementhium 639 base. So far it looks leeched, but I will be running alot of heavy updates and adding unique content (hopefully other servers don’t have).

I am allowing players to have access to the server, as I feel it will make a better community, if they are able to experience the updates themselves (beta). Basically the server is open, but it is not official. (On VPS)
You can play the server here VenomousX
Or Download it: [URL=http://“http://venomousx.com/forum/index.php?/forum/20-desktop-client/”]Link[/URL]
